judicialResults.label: Committed to Crown Court for sentence in custody

nextHearing.adjournmentReason: To attend or a warrant to issue

judicialResults.resultText:
CCSI - Committed to Crown Court for sentence in custody
Committed as a dangerous adult offender (Section 15 of the Sentencing Act 2020). Remanded in custody until hearing on 16/07/2025 at 14:00 in Crown Court 3-1, Liverpool Crown Court. Basis: Charged with a violent or sexual offence. Adjournment reason: To attend or a warrant to issue. Bail exceptions: Likely to offend - cause injury or fear of injury to an associated person. Reason for applying: Attempted suicide, Broken bail conditions.. Bail remand days to count (tagged days): 0. Victim personal statement to be presented to court by prosecutor or other person.
judicialResults.welshLabel: Traddodwyd chi i Lys y Goron i’ch dedfrydu tra yn y ddalfa
